instructions_to_main_agent.general: Build a high-trust, high-urgency travel deal aggregator. The UI should feel like a 'Pro Tool' that has been made accessible to the public. Use the 'Space Grotesk' font for all numbers and headings to give it that 'Data/Radar' feel.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout_strategy: Use a 'Masonry' or 'Bento' grid for the deals feed. Do not use a simple list. Each deal card should look like a physical ticket or a boarding pass with a 'perforated' visual separator between the image and the details.

components.deal_card: Must show: Original Price (strikethrough), New Price (Huge, Orange), Discount % (Badge), and a 'Verified' checkmark. The 'Book Now' button should be the only primary action.
components.filters: Place filters in a sticky sidebar or a top bar that looks like a cockpit control panel (toggles, sliders).
components.hero: Split screen. Left side: Value prop text. Right side: A 3D-tilted stack of 'Ticket Cards' floating.

instructions_to_main_agent.motion: Add subtle 'entrance' animations to the deal cards as they load (staggered fade-up). Use 'Sonner' for toast notifications when a new deal is found.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
